name: NEDNSSettings
desc: The DNS resolver settings of a network tunnel or a system-wide configuration.

items.name: var searchDomains: [String]?
items.desc: A list of domain strings used to fully qualify single-label host names.

items.name: var domainName: String?
items.desc: The primary domain of the tunnel.

items.name: var matchDomains: [String]?
items.desc: A list of domain strings used to determine which DNS queries will use the DNS resolver settings contained in this object.

items.name: var matchDomainsNoSearch: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean that specifies if the domains in the matchDomains list should not be appended to the resolverâ€™s list of search domains.

items.name: var dnsProtocol: NEDNSProtocol
items.desc: The DNS protocol used by the server, such as HTTPS or TLS.
